page.title: 12GARTH VILLAGE
page.content: {Garth Village}as the name implies is situated at the side of a steep sloping hillside ,from where there is an extensive view of the{VALE of {LLANGOLLEN. Most of the people live in {Detached houses}and work in places within a ten mile radius of the village. There is a{small plaground which is used by the children to play football,cricket and other games. There is now only{one shop which also serves the community as a {Post Office}and one chapel. Most of the houses have {Electricity and Gas.Some}houses still use solid fuel.The population of GARTH at the moment is approximately{300 {people.
